column5: Many have thier own thanks for this weekend and I for one have a big one. I was asked to take a special lady out to see the colors of this time of year and I was not about to pass up on it. We headed to the mountians of Collingood and well the colors were not at thier peak,it was a great day and the scenery was awesome.              Amazing was this old chair lift.        We could hear this sound coming above us,but we have no idea what these birds are.They made a clucking sound. At first I thought they were swans,but they were not.    The mountain was very busy not with just site seeiers, but mountian bikers. Man some of these bikes were pretty hitec.    I found this perfect ledge for a photo op,but I was the only taker on it.LOL    The entertianment was also a great laugh.     Also founf my chandelier.LOL     Now for what I am thankful for,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,This women took me back after a month of hell.That I am truely grateful for.      Happy thanks giving to you all and enjoy and love what you have. I found out myself,I have everything I ever need right here.
Touching post Brian. It was way more than just great photos for sure. Good luck to you.
Very nice pics Brian!!!  We don't have to look very far at all to find something we have to be thankful for!

Cheers to the Blowes family!  I'm just a stones throw away ya know Brian...and keep in mind as well that you can Fall hunt turkeys for the first time in History.. starting Tuesday (and I'm not talking the politicians!)!
Very nice photo's Brian.  Life seems to work itself out, I'm glad yours did.   Joey
Thanks for sharing this day with us misfish  and Happy Thanks giving to you too Leechman
Nice pictures! I think those are sandhill cranes. I saw a massive flock near Timmens last year. Very cool bird!
THANKSgiving for sure , thanks for sharing Brian.  TB
Great photos Brian got to like the fall colors good to see every thing is working out for you lets get together soon  Rob

Great pics Brian!  Glad to see everything is working out.  My turn to thank you, it's gotten my shutter finger itchy and I"m going to see if I can pry DanC off the couch to go out and get some pics of our own. Happy Thanksgiving Sis
Thanks so much for sharing that with us, Brian.  Best to you an the Missus.
Good news indeed Brian. Thanks for the pics and have a super rest of the weekend.
